justification: Vendor 2 offers 'interactive graph-based visualization of digital twin hierarchies' using 'Teamcenter’s Entity Explorer and Mendix’s customizable UI components' which aligns closely with the ability to present entities and relationships in an interactive, user-friendly way. However, the description focuses on interface support and standards rather than giving detailed examples of user experience or specific interaction functionalities, preventing a perfect score.
ability: The ability to present Digital Twin entities and their hierarchical or graph-based relationships in an interactive way
